Reviews.Content: Nice Hotel Fanatastic Italian restaurant and Super staff. Rooms are good value and internet connection is good. Would definitely stay here again.
Reviews.Author: Simon123

Reviews.Content: Great staff, Great Italian Restaurant and Ugly Rooms with Ugly Views The hotel is convenient in relation to its proximity to the A-5 and just 15-20 minutes south of Frankfurt. It is not the Frankfurter Hof. Pluses: Staff is very, very nice and the restaurant serves fantastic Italian food. Minuses: The rooms are what I would describe as low, low budget Howard Johnson style. Would love to meet the interior designer as the green, blue, pink carpet and coat of many colors draperies are absolutely ghastly. Furniture is Scandinavian-like and lighting inadequate. Inadequate lighting consists of two small and I mean small lamps in the room with a desk and desk chair. I went down the street and bought brighter bulbs and an extension cord. Rooms are in dire need of a fresh coat of paint and the towels are threadbare. The restaurant is truly this hotel's saving grace.
Reviews.Author: josef3
